name: Raft Fighter
description:
Raft Fighter 

by: 

Collin Cole: Coder and Level Designer

Lavern Dreves: Artist (Enemies, Player and Environments)

Sebastian Garda: Artist (Enemies, Player and UI )

TJ Meyer: Programmer, Level Designer and Music

Stranded with nothing but a raft, the castaway must fight through strange enemies and beat the creatures of the deep

WASD to move, mouse to aim, left mouse button to fire.
